评论概述: Versatile Winter set and a must have!
评论详情: I ordered this set in blue and I couldn't be happier with it overall. The blue color is true to how it appears online and the fabric ended up being better than I expected as it's not a thin jersey-like fabric, but it has more of a thick sweater feel which makes it great to wear later in the Fall/early Winter. Outdoor temps can drop but you'll still be cute, warm, and comfortable in this set! The top is a bit more cropped than I would like it to be but that's my personal preference. The good thing is that the skirt is long and fitted so one can easily pull it up to make up for the shirt's cropped length, without sacrificing much coverage on your legs. I do love that I can mix and match this set with other items in my closet. I often find myself throwing on a pair of high waisted skinnies with the cropped sweater in this set and a pair of riding boots, so this set can be versatile which also makes it a good value buy. At 5'6/115 lbs size SM, the fit of this set looks similar to that of what it looks like on the model in the listing photos, except I find the fabric to look thicker in person.  Based on the look, quality, feel and fit, I would definitely recommend it to anyone looking to add a cute outfit to their Fall/Winter closet.

Material was thick and had good stretch to it. Was not see through. Color seemed accurate to photo. The fit was just not flattering in my opinion. I found a better option similar product I preferred more.

Needed for a Greece themed party. The blue was the perfect color. Very comfortable, nice weight. It's appearance is a little shiny at first, but not garish. Good stretch. Wish the top wasnt "crop" but the skirt is long enough to pull up, so it looked like a dress.  I would buy more colors because of comfort factor
I love it💯💯 😍😍 I need more but different colors.
Super flattering, material is thick and comfortable. Good quality and warm! I wore it to thanksgiving and got all the complements! I feel like it will be durable too

There isn’t anything I don’t like about this outfit. The material is thick but mot heavy and the ribbed pattern gives it depth. I could dress this up with open toe heels or pointy booties or dress it down with a pair of Chucks or flat. For a point of reference, I’m 5’3 1/2” inches in height and weigh 130-132lbs and I purchased a small; the skirt hits just above my ankle and the fit is snug but not tight. Tons of stretch and very comfortable.
I love it! It's flattering and accentuates all of the positives. It looks great with a pair of boots.

I purchased the Khaki color suit, and the Dark Blue (Navy Blue) color suit.  They were a bit big in the waist band but was an easy fix of carefully going into side seam with seam ripper, gently pulling out elastic, measuring waist of how much to cut, then cutting elastic and hand stitching elastic back together along with side seam. Perfect!  These are lovely suits, and I am so happy with my purchase! Will probably buy other colors.

评论概述: Perfect Cold Day in Spring/Fall Outfit
评论详情: I wore this to an Honoree Awards Brunch Event. The perfect outfit, that day it was really cold…so sweater material was perfect. This was a really cute and comfy outfit. It does run a little big, but it was very cute on. I plan on ordering in different color.

I liked this 2 piece so much i purchased another one in a different color. The fabric is nice and thick. Washes well (i hang it to dry) and no color bleeding. My only issue is how the top fits. It seems like the cut is just a tad off and it bunches a bit around the armpit, side boob area. Maybe i am wearing the wrong bra, or smaller boobs would look better? Maybe bigger boobs? Unclear. I am 5’10”, about 135lbs, and a size 32D with a wide shoulder. Maybe my build just messes with the fit a bit. I still love the quality of the 2 piece and wore it all winter. The color hasn't faded, nothing has shrunk, and i feel beautiful whenever i wear it which is really all that matters.
It’s warm and knit and super cute!

Great color great fabric great fit This outfit has it all. Worth the price, and is perfect for early winter or spring, late fall. Looks casual without being too underdone.

I purchased this product in a size medium, though I could have got away with a small as this fabric has a lot of give to it. I am 5’6” and 135lbs. The material is nice and thick which was great cause it kept me warm wearing this for an event in winter. You can pull the skirt up to your waist to prevent your midsection from being exposed at all times, or keep the skirt at your hips if that’s the look you’re going for. I wore this for a winter fundraising event and pulled the skirt up. Occasionally my midsection would show if I was reaching up but nothing too crazy that would prevent me from wearing it to a formal event. The fabric is not see through and doesn’t wrinkle thanks to the thick fabric. I would recommend this outfit for a winter event! You could even wear the sweater and skirt separately opening up so many more options for wear!

评论概述: Ran Big, But Made It Work!
评论详情: I am 5 feet nothing and a petite/athletic build so I am usually a true size small. This set ran a little bit big on me. The skirt was slightly loose at the hips and top had extra room, but it was not a detriment. I threw a cute belt on the skirt and tucked the top into the front and it looked adorable! It’s beautiful on a body that fits it perfectly. Admittedly on me, it does make me look a little larger, but it is still an adorable set and was very appropriate for the setting I wore it in and I didn’t have to worry about looking “too sexy.” Put together and professional! 🎀

This is great in the winter! Super comfy and warm! Really flattering. I have a short torso, and also wasn't looking to show any skin, this fit just like I hoped it would. Cute separated pieces but with full coverage, no skin in between.  5'4" 128lbs.

La tela es de buena calidad! Si te gustan las ropas diseñada a tu medida,  te recomiendo una talla menos . Por que tiene mucho slim.  Elasticidad.  Para que me comprenda mejor.  Y los colores son exactos hermosos 💜 💕

I love this set and love to wear it together. I had anticipated wearing the sweater with pants,other bottoms etc but I have found it to be a little off looking. I think it’s a combo of the length and width. Wish the top was less boxy for that reason.
